instruction: Explain the options investors have to manage their exposure to Indian equities.
output: Investors who are interested in Indian equity markets have a few options available to them to manage their exposure. One way is to invest in products such as ETFs that are linked to the MSCI India Index. Another option is to invest in futures contracts that are also linked to the index. The notional volumes of these futures contracts have been increasing over time, indicating investor interest. Investors in futures contracts can also roll over their positions each quarter to maintain their exposure to the index. Overall, there are several products available for investors who want to manage their exposure to Indian equities.
